title: 'The culture needs to change' - Vaughan on Brook nightclub altercation
summary: Michael Vaughan gives his thoughts on England's white-ball captain, Harry Brook, after he apologised for being involved in an altercation with a nightclub bouncer the night before a one-day international on the tour of New Zealand that preceded the Ashes.

title: Weekly sports quiz:  How many managers have Man Utd had since Ferguson?
summary: How much attention have you paid to what's happened in the world of sport over the past seven days?

title: Leeds and Wales legend Yorath dies aged 75
summary: Terry Yorath, who won the league title with Leeds in 1974 and came close to guiding Wales to the 1994 World Cup finals, dies at the age of 75.

title: Volvo touts EX60â€™s range and charging speed ahead of official debut
summary: Volvo is starting to trickle out some details about its upcoming midsize electric SUV, the EX60, before its official debut January 21st. The EX60 will have an estimated range of 400 miles (or 810km based on the generous WLTP standard in Europe). That's significantly more range than any previous Volâ€¦

title: Players 'not protected' over schedule - Sabalenka
summary: World number one Aryna Sabalenka says tennis authorities "follow their interests" with regards to the tennis calendar and are not "focusing on protecting all of us".

title: Unloved in PE, ignored at top - what is cross country's future?
summary: Cross country evokes miserable school memories for many, while top athletes focus on Olympic disciplines instead - what is its future?

title: RayNeo Air 4 Pro AR glasses with HDR10 support go global
summary: The RayNeo Air 4 Pro AR glasses, which were unveiled in China last year, have now made their global debut at CES 2026. The TCL-backed brand showcased the Air 4 Pro and an eSIM version of the RayNeo X3 Pro at the event. RayNeo Air 4 Pro is being touted as the worldâ€™s first HDR10-enabled AR glasses. â€¦

title: The NFL record-breaker who never planned to play the sport
summary: Jacksonville Jaguars kicker Cam Little holds the record for the NFL's longest field goal - not bad for someone who never planned to play the sport.

title: McCullum keen to remain as England head coach despite Ashes defeat
summary: Brendan McCullum says he's "not opposed" to making adjustments but says a complete overhaul of his approach won't be in store should he remain England coach, following their 4-1 Ashes series defeat to Australia down under.

title: 'Areas to improve' but McCullum 'won't be told what to do'
summary: Coach Brendon McCullum says he will not be told what to do but accepts there are "areas to improve" after England's Ashes defeat.

title: 'We need to be smarter' - Stokes admits England must improve
summary: Ben Stokes says it's time for "some honest truths" to be shared amongst his team, following England's 4-1 Ashes series defeat in Australia.

title: England show fight but fall short as Australia seal 4-1 Ashes win
summary: After bowling England out for 342, Australia chase down their winning target of 160 with five wickets in hand to win the fifth Ashes Test on the final day in Sydney, sealing a 4-1 series win to retain the urn.
